generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, where multiple cars are driving.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, adjacent to parked cars and a curb.
- building: A residential building with a brown roof and white walls is visible on the right side of the image.
- fence: A fence is visible on the right side of the image, running along the property line of the building.
- pole: Several tall, vertical poles (likely for streetlights) are visible along the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible on the left side of the road, particularly near the railway tracks.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver Audi, a black SUV, and a silver Volkswagen.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- truck: A white caravan or trailer is parked on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible in the distance on the right side of the road.
